##  FullSearchResultTopdown template

###### Preview


![fullSearchResultTopdownTemplate](https://koregeneric.s3.amazonaws.com/SearchAssist_UI_Img/sdk2.0_doc_templates/fullSearchResultTopdownTemplate.PNG)
